content:
Encourage Idea Creation and Sharing in Experience Cloud Sites

Add your Ideas users to Experience Cloud sites to take advantage of new ways to collaborate.

Available in: Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

User Permissions Needed:
Customize Application

Create public or private spaces for employees, customers, and partners to collaborate on best practices and business processes. Enable members to create ideas and idea themes and have a dialog around them.

Assign the task of moderating and managing idea sites to internal members, depending on their privileges.

Organize your site into smaller groups by creating zones within a site that reflect special interests, product groupings, or types of customers.

Members have visibility into different zones based on their user profiles:

* Idea community users see associated zones.
* Internal users with permission see all internal-only zones in the organization.
* Portal users can see associated zones.
* Users accessing the portal or Idea community through an API can access all zones that they have access to in all contexts.

Ready to add ideas? Manage Ideas:
Manage organization-wide settings for Ideas.
Enable Idea Themes
Reward the most influential and innovative members of your Ideas community by acknowledging their participation and contribution to the community.
Designate Community Experts
Set Page Layouts for Ideas
Customize Ideas standard and custom fields to meet unique requirements.
Add Apex Triggers to Idea Comments

Migrate to the Community Application if your organization enabled Ideas before the Winter '10 release.

The Ideas feature serves communities of users who post, vote for, and comment on ideas. An Ideas community provides an online, transparent way for you to attract, manage, and showcase innovation.
title: Encouraging Idea Creation and Sharing in Experience Cloud Sites
